name: Heralds of Silence. Chapter one
description:
Heralds of Silence is a first-person horror game. Solve complex puzzles, look for clues, dive into the darkness of empty corridors and, perhaps, you will discover the secrets of a mysterious scientific complex and the curse of the Silence.

Average time to complete the game: 90 minutes

Story

Heralds of Silence is a huge World with rich history and plenty events and characters. This is a only first chpter in long story. Step by step, unravel the story of a sinister scientific complex where human experiments are carried out in the hope of deriving humanity to new heights. But will they succeed or will they release a new plague into this world?

Characters

Emma, a third-year medical student, lives with her parents and a dog named Chucky, a completely ordinary girl, no different from her peers, except that she was kidnapped a few days ago. And, seems, she can't speak. And this is her story.

Gameplay

Wander through the dark corridors of the scientific complex, get scared, solve difficult puzzles, concentrate and look around. It won't be easy.
